about_the_game:
A cooperative role-playing video game for 1-5 players. You are a squad of le Fourrageurs in the service of the Burgomaster and your task is to go to the islands for treasure, to replenish the coffers of the colony, and save Saint-Gabriel from ruin.

But this task is not as simple as it sounds.

The fortress city of Saint-Gabriel has barely stayed afloat for the last few years, and the Burgomaster has decided to put an end to this. He thought long and hard and selected the most suitable and reliable individuals for this event—you (never-drying sailors, sitting in the port without leaving). For the adventure to begin, you are forced to leave the warm tavern and go, with friends or alone, into the ocean to dangerous islands. Some of them look like a resort, while others immediately make it clear that nothing good awaits you here.

If you manage to survive, then upon returning to the city, you will find... a sad picture... many trading establishments have closed due to the crisis, and you will have to invest so that artisans return to the city. Also, thanks to the accumulated experience, you will be able to develop your fourrager: Learn new tricks to feel more confident on forays; learn the recipes for powerful spells that the sage keeps. Learn how to assemble useful tools from scrap materials. Stock up on the necessary weapons, or go with what the Motherland equips you with.

Trust the sea, your survival skills, and friends. You have no other choice...

Unless, of course, you are considering a tribunal for failure to comply with an order!

What to expect:

- Co-op up to 5 players with asymmetrical gameplay.

- Character progression: crafts, abilities, the appearance of a second hand 0_0

- Restore the settlement, gradually fill it with merchants.

- Advanced crafting system: create useful potions and scrolls of magic.

- Character customization

- Mysterious dungeons with valuables, unusual enemies, and puzzles.

- If you do not understand anything, then play music for your smarter friends.

short_description: Cooperative RPG about exploring dungeons on unknown islands in search of treasures and knowledge. Explore mysterious locations, find rare resources to craft powerful magic and artifacts, do not let ancient creatures kill you. Do not return without an object, CARRY OUT THE ORDER!!!
